[00:00.61]I'd rather keep it real with ya
[00:07.49]Real hot girl s**t ah
[00:12.06]It ain't always about what you like sometimes it's about what's right
[00:14.51]Helluva made this beat baby
[00:15.91]Huh
[00:16.09]I'd rather be a B-I-T-C-H
[00:17.68]I'd rather keep it real with ya
[00:19.59]'Cause that's what you gon' call me when I'm trippin' anyway
[00:21.56]You know you can't control me baby
[00:23.36]You need a real one in your life
[00:25.02]Them b***hes ain't gon' give it to you right
[00:27.03]I'd rather be a B-I-T-C-H
[00:28.78]I'd rather keep it real with ya
[00:30.75]'Cause that's what you gon' call me when I'm trippin' anyway
[00:32.66]You know you can't control me baby
[00:34.43]You need a real one in your life
[00:36.00]Them b***hes ain't gon' give it to you right
[00:37.86]Ayy
[00:38.38]Why you wanna play with me
[00:39.51]You know I'm undefeated
[00:40.84]A real hot girl know how to keep a n***a heated
[00:43.66]You say you want respect well treat me how you wanna be treated
[00:46.43]You told me keep it real but you don't practice what you preachin'
[00:49.29]You want me to blow your phone up
[00:50.57]And come a-lookin' for you 'til I find ya
[00:52.11]You really want me to whoop the ho that you f**kin' with if I find her
[00:54.89]B***h you ain't that busy I don't give a f**k what you ain't got time for
[00:57.65]You look me in my eyes and know you lying man that's fraud bruh
[01:00.15]Man you knew I was a player 'fore you met me need to relax
[01:03.13]You know that you gon' hate me if I get to playin' get-back
[01:05.68]I ain't turn into no bad b***h when you met me boy I been that
[01:08.59]You tryna make me somethin' that I ain't and I ain't with that
[01:11.20]Nah
[01:11.38]I'd rather be a B-I-T-C-H
[01:12.77]I'd rather keep it real with ya
[01:14.78]'Cause that's what you gon' call me when I'm trippin' anyway
[01:16.74]You know you can't control me baby
[01:18.54]You need a real one in your life
[01:20.22]Them b***hes ain't gon' give it to you right
[01:22.22]I'd rather be a B-I-T-C-H

[01:26.12]'Cause that's what you gon' call me when I'm trippin' anyway
[01:27.79]You know you can't control me baby
[01:29.52]You need a real one in your life
[01:31.22]Them b***hes ain't gon' give it to you right
[01:33.81]I got my mind on gettin' paid we ain't spoke in some days
[01:36.45]He probaby thinkin' I'm in pain but I'm really on game
[01:39.30]Ain't no n***a finna stop me independent I got me
[01:41.97]All the s**t that I be needin' can't depend on a "probably"
[01:44.82]And that's f**ked up 'cause you know that I don't f**k with nobody
[01:47.48]I be quiet but you out here tellin' stories one-sided
[01:50.20]I ain't perfect and I try to fix the s**t that ain't workin'
[01:53.03]But it's 2020 I ain't finna argue 'bout twerkin'
[01:55.91]Since you wanna test them waters might as well jump in with both feet
[01:58.82]If you leave me and you see me better act like you don't know me

[02:04.77]When you realize she ain't got you like I got you I can't help ya

data.trans:
[ti:B.I.T.C.H. (Explicit)]
[ar:Megan Thee Stallion]
[al:B.I.T.C.H.]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.61]我宁愿和你坦诚相待
[00:07.49]真正的辣妹子
[00:12.06]重要的并非总是你喜欢什么 有时候 重要的是什么是对的
[00:14.51]Helluva Beats制作
[00:15.91]//
[00:16.09]我宁愿做个坏女人
[00:17.68]我宁愿和你坦诚相待
[00:19.59]因为在我发脾气的时候 你就会这样说我
[00:21.56]你知道你无法控制我 宝贝
[00:23.36]你的人生中需要一个坦诚的人
[00:25.02]那些女人给不了你这样的感情
[00:27.03]我宁愿做个坏女人
[00:28.78]我宁愿和你坦诚相待
[00:30.75]因为在我发脾气的时候 你就会这样说我
[00:32.66]你知道你无法控制我 宝贝
[00:34.43]你的人生中需要一个坦诚的人
[00:36.00]那些女人给不了你这样的感情
[00:37.86]//
[00:38.38]你为何想和我闹
[00:39.51]你知道我不可战胜
[00:40.84]真正的辣妹知道如何让男人始终心潮澎湃
[00:43.66]你说你想被人尊重 那你希望别人怎么对你 你就要怎样对待我
[00:46.43]你要我坦诚相待 但你自己说的话 自己都做不到
[00:49.29]你想要我整天不停给你打电话
[00:50.57]到处搜寻你 直到找到你
[00:52.11]你真的希望我找到和你在一起的女人 然后好好教训她
[00:54.89]碧池 你没有那么忙 你不在意的事情 我也不在意
[00:57.65]我们眼神相对 我就知道你在撒谎 都是假的 兄弟
[01:00.15]朋友 在你遇到我之前就知道我是不好惹的 你得放轻松
[01:03.13]你知道 如果我开始反击 你肯定会开始恨我
[01:05.68]当你遇到我时 我不是坏女人 都是过去的事情了
[01:08.59]你想让我变成另一个人 我根本不想理你
[01:11.20]//
[01:11.38]我宁愿做个坏女人
[01:12.77]我宁愿和你坦诚相待
[01:14.78]因为在我发脾气的时候 你就会这样说我
[01:16.74]你知道你无法控制我 宝贝
[01:18.54]你的人生中需要一个坦诚的人
[01:20.22]那些女人给不了你这样的感情
[01:22.22]我宁愿做个坏女人
[01:23.74]我宁愿和你坦诚相待
[01:26.12]因为在我发脾气的时候 你就会这样说我
[01:27.79]你知道你无法控制我 宝贝
[01:29.52]你的人生中需要一个坦诚的人
[01:31.22]那些女人给不了你这样的感情
[01:33.81]我一心一意赚钱 我们已经几天没说话
[01:36.45]他可能觉得我很痛苦 但我过得正开心呢
[01:39.30]谁都不能阻止我 我自食其力 有我自己足矣
[01:41.97]我需要的东西那么多 不能指望一个不确定的人
[01:44.82]真可悲 你知道我不跟任何人有过多来往
[01:47.48]我安安静静 但你在外面自作多情 胡说八道
[01:50.20]我并不完美 我想修复这不可能的关系
[01:53.03]但现在已经2020年 我不想争吵什么乱七八糟的事
[01:55.91]既然你想试试水 那你最好全情投入
[01:58.82]如果你离开我 再见到我时 最好装作不认识我
[02:01.54]如果你觉得和别的女人过会更好 那就请便
[02:04.15]去找她吧
[02:04.77]当你发现她根本不像我这样在意你时 我也帮不了你
